mapper.sql: id, pid, name, value, type, icon, url, status, sort, create_at, update_at
mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.pid as pid, c.name as name, c.value as value, c.type as type, c.icon as icon, c.url as url, c.status as status, c.sort as sort, c.create_at as create_at, c.update_at as update_at from sys_user as a LEFT JOIN sys_user_role as ab ON a.id = ab.u_id LEFT JOIN sys_role as b ON ab.r_id = b.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission as bc ON b.id = bc.r_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission as c ON bc.p_id = c.id WHERE a.status = 1 AND b.status = 1 AND c.status = 1 AND a.id = #{id} ORDER BY c.type, c.sort
